Detailed Description

Array of characteristic features that identifies a pattern.

This class stores a set of features computed from a pattern where the character's pixels has been mapped.

Todo:
Implement another method to compute distance between vectors (e.g. the Mahalanobis distance).

void FeatureVector::reset (  )  [inline]

Reset the vector content.

Postcondition:
The features are set to 0.0 but the vector size remains equal.

void FeatureVector::resize ( const unsigned int &  n  )  [inline]

Resize the vector to the specified size.

Parameters:
n Number of features to store in the vector.
Postcondition:
The previous features are removed and an new vector of size n is initialized to 0.0.
